results.title: API Issue Resolution
results.content: Diagnose the current API integration problems, Implement necessary fixes to ensure smooth data flow between frontend and backend, Optimize API calls for improved performance, Ensure proper error handling and logging, Update API documentation as needed

results.title: VueJS Banner Enhancement
results.content: Investigate the cause of low-quality images in the banner, Implement image optimization techniques, Ensure responsive design across various devices and screen sizes, Improve loading times for banner images, Implement lazy loading if appropriate

results.title: General Improvements
results.content: Conduct a brief audit of the existing codebase, Suggest and implement any critical optimizations, Ensure cross-browser compatibility, Improve overall website performance
